files.name: package.json
files.content:
{
  "name": "zui",
  "version": "3.0.0",
  "type": "module",
  "private": true,
  "engines": {
    "node": ">=14",
    "pnpm": ">=8"
  },
  "files": [
    "dist/zui"
  ],
  "main": "./dist/zui/zui.js",
  "module": "./dist/zui/zui.esm.js",
  "exports": {
    ".": {
      "import": "./dist/zui.esm.js",
      "require": "./dist/zui.js"
    },
    "./css": "./dist/zui.css"
  },
  "scripts": {
    "dev": "vite --host",
    "dev:exts": "tsx ./scripts/dev/index.ts",
    "build:vite": "tsc && vite build",
    "build": "tsx ./scripts/build",
    "preview": "vite preview",
    "preinstall": "npx only-allow pnpm",
    "lint": "eslint .",
    "docs:dev-fast": "cd docs && pnpm dev",
    "docs:dev": "pnpm docs:prepare -- --copy && pnpm docs:dev-fast & pnpm docs:watch",
    "docs:dev:exts": "pnpm docs:prepare -- --copy --exts --lib=zui*exts && pnpm docs:dev-fast & pnpm docs:watch -- --exts",
    "docs:watch": "tsx ./scripts/docs/watch.ts",
    "docs:build": "pnpm docs:prepare -- --copy --ignoreNotReady && cd docs && pnpm build",
    "docs:build:exts": "pnpm docs:prepare -- --copy --exts --lib=zui*exts && cd docs && pnpm build",
    "docs:serve": "cd docs && pnpm serve",
    "docs:prepare": "tsx ./scripts/docs/prepare.ts",
    "extend-lib": "tsx ./scripts/libs/extend-lib.ts",
    "publish:npm": "pnpm build -- --ignoreNotReady && tsx ./scripts/build/publish.ts && cd ./publish && npm publish"
  },
  "workspaces": [
    "./lib"
  ],
  "dependencies": {
    "@floating-ui/core": "^1.6.4",
    "@floating-ui/dom": "^1.6.7",
    "@floating-ui/utils": "^0.2.4",
    "@zui/base": "workspace:*",
    "@zui/scrollbar": "workspace:*",
    "@zui/typography": "workspace:*",
    "@zui/utilities": "workspace:*",
    "cash-dom": "^8.1.5",
    "dayjs": "^1.11.11",
    "htm": "^3.1.1",
    "preact": "^10.22.1",
    "tinykeys": "^2.1.0"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "@faker-js/faker": "^8.4.1",
    "@mertasan/tailwindcss-variables": "^2.7.0",
    "@preact/preset-vite": "^2.8.3",
    "@types/fs-extra": "^11.0.4",
    "@types/glob": "^8.1.0",
    "@types/markdown-it": "^13.0.8",
    "@types/minimist": "^1.2.5",
    "@types/node": "^20.14.10",
    "@typescript-eslint/eslint-plugin": "^6.21.0",
    "@typescript-eslint/parser": "^6.21.0",
    "autoprefixer": "^10.4.19",
    "chokidar": "^3.6.0",
    "colorette": "^2.0.20",
    "cssnano": "^6.1.2",
    "eslint": "^8.57.0",
    "eslint-config-airbnb-base": "^15.0.0",
    "eslint-config-airbnb-typescript": "^17.1.0",
    "eslint-plugin-import": "^2.29.1",
    "fast-glob": "^3.3.2",
    "fs-extra": "^11.2.0",
    "highlight.js": "^11.10.0",
    "jquery": "^3.7.1",
    "markdown-it": "^13.0.2",
    "markdown-it-anchor": "^8.6.7",
    "markdown-it-toc-done-right": "^4.2.0",
    "minimist": "^1.2.8",
    "postcss": "^8.4.39",
    "postcss-import": "^15.1.0",
    "postcss-inset": "^1.0.0",
    "postcss-rem-to-pixel": "^4.1.2",
    "tailwindcss": "^3.4.4",
    "tsx": "^3.14.0",
    "typescript": "^5.5.3",
    "vite": "^4.5.3",
    "vite-plugin-eslint": "^1.8.1",
    "vite-plugin-zip-file": "^2.2.0"
  }
}

files.name: postcss.config.cjs
tailwind.config.cjs
tsconfig.json
files.content:
{
  "compilerOptions": {
    "target": "ESNext",
    "useDefineForClassFields": false,
    "module": "ESNext",
    "lib": ["ESNext", "DOM"],
    "moduleResolution": "Node",
    "strict": true,
    "sourceMap": true,
    "resolveJsonModule": true,
    "isolatedModules": true,
    "esModuleInterop": true,
    "noEmit": true,
    "noUnusedLocals": true,
    "noUnusedParameters": true,
    "noImplicitReturns": false,
    "paths": {
      "@zui/*": ["./lib/*"]
    }
  },
  "include": [
    "src",
    "config",
    "dev/src/dev.ts",
    "exts/*/dev.ts"
  ],
  "exclude": [
    "public"
  ]
}
